title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB:
When following the steps in 1GEWMOZ:
1. Create a new basic project
2. Create a new file named test.xml
3. The default editor for XML files is the scripted resource editor example
4. Select test.xml in the Navigator
5. Choose 'Open With' from the context menu
6. Select 'Default Text Editor'

The observed behavior is that nothing happens; it seems to reactivate the scripted resource editor example instead of opening the file in the default text editor.
EB:
When following the steps in 1GEWMOZ:
1. Create a new basic project
2. Create a new file named test.xml
3. The default editor for XML files is the scripted resource editor example
4. Select test.xml in the Navigator
5. Choose 'Open With' from the context menu
6. Select 'Default Text Editor'

The expected behavior is that a new editor should be opened on the file, because the selected editor type is different from the currently open editor.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new basic project
2. Create a new file named test.xml
3. The default editor for XML files is the scripted resource editor example
4. Select test.xml in the Navigator
5. Choose 'Open With' from the context menu
6. Select 'Default Text Editor'

Expected result: A new editor should be opened on the file, using the selected 'Default Text Editor'.
